name: The Perfect Shape - Demo
description:
Enjoy 3 levels of The Perfect Shape. A precision platformer and something more - choose your shape, manage your consumables on the go, face your enemies or trick them using your environment, and when you're ready: take the level challenge!

Developer note:  the game was made out of passion- pouring into it elements that I enjoy as a gamer, striving to give the player a unique experience both enjoyable and challenging. Left on purpose hidden features and mechanics for the most keen of players to discover. If you enjoy the game please consider supporting us by leaving a feedback, comment, sharing via your social media or even donate/buy the full game. We are at the very beginning of our journey and every help we can get is greatly appreciated as it boosts our confidence and encourages us to improve.
